tool_description: Get data about classes, subclasses, items, spells, and feats from D&D 5e.
name: Dungeons and Dragon 5e
title: Dungeons and Dragon 5e

api_list.name: Get subclass
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dungeons-and-dragon-5e.p.rapidapi.com/class/rogue/assassin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dungeons-and-dragon-5e.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dungeons-and-dragon-5e.p.rapidapi.com/class/{class_name}/{subclass_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dungeons-and-dragon-5e.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get background
api_list.description: Returns information about the D&D background in JSON format.

api_list.name: Get feat
api_list.description: Returns information about the feat. Mainly full text description.

api_list.name: Get spell
api_list.description: Get information about a D&D spell like the school of magic, spell level and the full description.

api_list.name: Get item
api_list.description: Returns information about the D&D item in JSON format. Only includes magic items, not equipment.

required_parameters.name: item_name
required_parameters.description: The full name of a D&D item. Words separated by dashes.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dungeons-and-dragon-5e.p.rapidapi.com/item/blackrazor"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dungeons-and-dragon-5e.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
